label: AB4C_oC24_63_c_fg_c-001
title: Anhydrite (CaSO$_{4}$, $H0_{1}$) Structure
comments:
(Hawthorne, 1975) give the structure in the $Amma$ setting of space group \#63. We have transformed this to the standard $Cmcm$ setting. 
 The addition of water into the anhydrite crystal transforms it into \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C6D_mC48_15_e_2f_3f_e-001}{gypsum}.
